Text.Page:
The dormitories on the third floor are overrun with lunatic students.

The worst are the {@LinkCreature:22#14#vadoma acolytes}! If you don't stop them, you'll never get a foothold established on the floor.

Everything's turning out so dark.

Judging from your appearance, they fought hard.

You know, there's a part of me that's actually proud of their accomplishments.

I hope I remember that when I finally put their bodies to rest.
